Name: Box Cats Puzzle
About the game: This Is A Puzzle Game. You Need to Help the Cats Get into the Box. ★200 Challenging Levels ★casual Mode With Unlimited Fun ★You can make your own levels to share with friends BGM:　Piano25 By MAOUDAMASHII The New Free DLC-Cat Year 2022 a small physics game. You need to stack multiple cats of different shapes on top of each other, so that you can pass the level by keeping them from falling for a certain period of time. ★41 unstable levels BGM: 猫のワルツ By ゆうきわたる The new model of the year of the ox: Move other kittens so that our 'CowCat' can eat grass ★30 new levels BGM:Kurukuru By ONTAMA Our first DLC-Halloween mode Three cats of different shapes are randomly generated in each round. You need to put them in the box. If the cats are connected in a line, they will become bats and fly away until the box is full. How many cats can you put in？ BGM: Halloween night By Syappon
